channel.title: How do you make a server?
channel.description: How do you make a server? I've found a forum but it's very difficult. Can you explain it in an easy way? I already have no-ip and added a host already but I don't know how to pick a source and get it to run. Please help, thank you.

item.title: How do you make a server?
item.dc:creator: @Ryanz Ryanz
item.description:
@Ryanz wrote:

[quote=“Erikster382, post:1, topic:252552”]How do you make a server? I’ve found a forum but it’s very difficult. Can you explain it in an easy way? I already have no-ip and added a host already but I don’t know how to pick a source and get it to run. Please help, thank you.[/quote]Try searching on www.moparisthebest.com/smf

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a server?
